title: Optimizing Mathematics Learning Outcomes by Comparing Flipped Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic mathematical concepts and experience with online learning platforms
context.additional_context: A faculty competency enhancement program for pre-service or in-service teachers. Conducted in a BYOD environment, exploring a blended model combining face-to-face and online learning

learning_goals: Learners can explain structural differences between traditional flipped learning and fully online flipped learning with over 80% accuracy
Learners can evaluate the impact of flow experience (immersion) on learning outcomes during mathematical problem-solving through case analysis
Learners can apply two learning models to a PBL project and comparatively analyze correlations between flexibility-interaction-performance
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
